title: my_world
description: This is my-world and my first project.
readme:
my-world - v1

This project example.com built with Next.js and hosted with Vercel

And this is my first web project.

![image](https://github.com/yigitgulmez/my_world/blob/master/public/images/myworld1.png?raw=true) ## ‚ùó Forking this repo - It is not appropriate for anyone to use code without giving credit to the author. Therefore, when using my code, please make sure to provide proper attribution to me. ## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation & Set Up 1. Install dependencies ```sh npm install ``` 1. Install and use the correct version of Node using [NVM](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm) ```sh nvm install ``` 1. Start the development server ```sh npm run dev ``` ## üöÄ Building and Running for Production 1. Generate a full static production build ```sh npm run build ``` 1. Preview the site as it will appear once deployed ```sh npm run start ``` 1. Run a memory test to evaluate performance and stability. ```sh npm run memory ```
